data.name: Virgin Australia Velocity High Flyer Credit Card (Bonus Velocity Points Offer)
data.description:
If you love to travel, the Virgin Australia Velocity High Flyer Card is for you. Earn up to 100,000 Bonus Points (25,000 points each month when $3,500 or more is spent for the first 4 months) plus a 12 month balance transfer. 
Earn Velocity Points on your everyday spend, plus enjoy exclusive flight benefits and a range of complimentary insurances. It’s a seriously rewarding credit card
https://virginmoney.com.au/credit-card

features.additionalInfo: 0% p.a. for 12 months on balance transfers (reverts to cash advance rate).

Enjoy an exclusive $129 Virgin Australia Gift Voucher17 each year. To unlock your benefit, simply make a retail purchase in the 2 months prior to requesting your voucher.You also get to relax, with two complimentary Single Entry Virgin Australia domestic Lounge passes33, on us, each year
Relax, with two complimentary Single Entry Virgin Australia domestic Lounge passes, on us, each year

Enjoy all the benefits of your Virgin Money credit card with Apple Pay on iPhone, Apple Watch, iPad and Mac. Using Apple Pay is simple, and it works with the devices you use every day. Your card information is secure because it isn't stored on your device or shared when you pay. Paying in stores, in selected apps and on participating websites has never been easier or safer.
An easier, faster and secure way to tap and pay for purchases under $100. Use your compatible Samsung device at point of sale terminals where you can swipe or tap your card

Rest assured that we're on the case, to keep your card safe around the clock with Fraudshield®. As long as you keep your contact details up to date, we'll contact you if we detect any irregular transactions on your account. Our cards also come with Visa's Zero Liability policy, ensuring you won't be held liable for fraudulent transactions made with your card

Cardholders receive 90 days complimentary insurance against loss, theft or accidental damage on covered products purchased anywhere in the world using your Virgin Australia Velocity High Flyer Card up to specified amounts as outlined in the Complimentary Insurance Terms and Conditions.

Cardholders are entitled to International Travel Insurance which may cover you and your family when travelling overseas, for medical expenses, loss or theft of personal items, unexpected trip cancellation and more when you purchase your overseas travel tickets on your Virgin Australia Velocity High Flyer Card as outlined in the Complimentary Insurance Terms and Conditions.

Cardholders may be entitled to extended warranty insurance of up to 12 months which may cover you at the end of the Australian warranty period that applies to covered products you purchase on your Virgin Australia Velocity High Flyer card as outlined in the Complimentary Insurance Terms and Conditions
Turn your everyday credit card spend into flights, accommodation and more
Earn up to 100,000 bonus Velocity Points (25,000 Points for each month you spend $3,500 or more on Eligible Transactions in the first 4 months from card approval).

Reward yourself with a lower rate. Apply for an instalment plan that lets you pay off your card balance with certainty and allows you the potential to save on monthly interest that you may otherwise pay. Plus you can still enjoy interest free days on your other purchases made outside the Fixed Payment Option

Take advantage of round-the-clock access to the Visa Platinum Concierge Service14. It's the next best thing to having your very own personal assistant and all it takes is a phone call or a mouse click, anytime, anywhere in the world.

If you purchase the entire cost of covered products using your Virgin Australia Velocity Flyer or High Flyer Card, the scheme guarantees the cardholder gets the best price if, within 60 days of the purchase, they advise us that they have, subsequent to their purchase, received a catalogue showing the same covered products for a lower price from a store within 25 kilometers of the store from where the covered product was purchased, and the price difference is greater than AU$75, we will refund the price difference up to $500.  It does not apply to any purchases over the internet, as outlined in the Complimentary Insurance Terms and Conditions.

Gain access to unique Visa privileges such as a range of great reduced holiday offers on hotels and resorts around the globe & up to 30% discount on green fees at some of the most prestigious golf clubs around the world. With Visa Platinum Benefits you'll also get exclusive access to pre-sale tickets to some of the most sought-after events in Australia
For purchases of up to $100, simply wave & go anywhere that has a Visa payWave sensor, making payments easy and convenient

eligibility.additionalInfo: You must be at least 18 years of age to apply for a credit card

fees.name: Additional card fee
fees.additionalInfo: Fee charged for an additional card holder

fees.name: Annual fee
fees.additionalInfo: Annual fee charged on the card

fees.name: Dishonour Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Fee for each time a cheque or Direct Debit payment is dishonoured

fees.name: Domestic Cash Advance above $100
fees.additionalInfo: Domestic cash withdrawals from your credit card

fees.name: Domestic Cash Advance below $100
fees.additionalInfo: Domestic cash withdrawals from your credit card

fees.name: International Cash Advance
fees.additionalInfo: International cash withdrawls on your credit card

fees.name: International Transaction Fee
fees.additionalInfo: For retail purchases or cash advance transactions made in a foreign currency or using a foreign merchant

fees.name: Late Payment Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Fee for  each time we do not receive the Minimum Payment Due and any Overdue Amount by the payment due date, debited to your Account after the payment due date.

fees.name: Overlimit Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Fee per statement period when your credit limit is exceeded

fees.name: Paper Statement Fee
fees.additionalInfo: For each statement period we issue you with a paper statement, $2 will be debited to your account in the following statement period. This may be waived in limited circumstances

lendingRates.additionalInfo: Up to 44 days Interest free  on retail purchases (unless you have a balance transfer)
